data.message: Eminem should have stayed out of politics! If he had half a brain he would see what its going to cost him. What a dumbass for submitting to Hollywood and other rich elitists, while his followers are broke in the hood! lmao, well played!

replies.message: Stop it😂😂😂
Dumb fools! Trying to bash someone while he raps about doing drugs, beating women and a bunch of other bullshit. What a great role model! lmao
Eminem said the same thing about bush,he has never stayed out of politics and as always spoke his mind,that's why his fans love him .
He is still going to loose millions, just hide and watch. He should have taken a play from the NFL's playbook! lmao

1. If he had half the brain? Eminem is an multi award winning music genius.
2. If he had stayed out of politics? Eminem has made prior political comments on both parties and social issues, which is deeply knitted with politics.
3.Dumbass? You're commenting on his post with millions of followers and millions of dollars.
3. His followers are rich, poor, middle class. Donald Trump is a rich hollywood elitist and with this post he is not catering to them.
5. Crawl back to your hole, troll.
He's always been political, genius
Like i said, just hide and watch! Tools! Genius! LMAO
Like so many have slready said...he has always been political..but no one gave a fuck then. Trump needs media troll protection.offended? Dgaf.
Entertainers should stay outta politics!!! (say the people who voted for the host of Celebrity Apprentice) 🤣

Nick Bozzelli

Maybe your butthurt rant would be valid if he didn't hold the record for album sales, pusscake.

Cry some more.
Dakota Atkins Lmao, not crying. Im just telling you fools its going to hurt the has beens business. Ask the NFL....lmao
Trump isn't a rich elitist ? His entire cabinet is filled with rich elitist that control global banks. Nick, you're a dumbass
Triggering complete! Time to turn off notifications from all these tools commenting....lmao If your too stupid to see what the the left is doing, maybe your an Eminem fan.....bwaaaahaaaa!

You people are missing his point... he doesn't give a F what anyone thinks and he has enough money to last a lifetime.  But you so called followers who say you will stop listening to his music or whatever, you will get over it.  Trump won't be President forever.  And people who truly love Marshall and his label, this is just what they crave!!  Down and dirty lyrics.  Cry babies.

That's where you just made a mistake... You're prejudice. I'm not in the hood anymore and I'm not broke and I fully support Em and there's plenty of people like me so he's not alone and like family we'll keep him successful.

Nick Bozzelli

Your daughter just sent me nudes.
He’s washed up and already made his money it’s not like he’s making new material after that joke he put out in 2013
Even if he literally lost 10 million it wouldn't fucking matter because he's rich as fuck.
Tyler Young The Clintons, Pelosi, Obama who vacations in the Hamptons, they are all rich.
What is he gonna lose?he's worth like 500 million you dumb cunt
You know he's been anti-trump for quite some time. He's also been rapping about politics forever. This leads me to think you're fucking retadred.
Doesn't change the fact you're all dumbass tools! lmao
To borrow a line from the "New Guy", "who's da' bitch now?"
Umm he dissed bush back in 04 , tipper in 02 so its not like its new
